definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְחַוֶּה־]] Ps 19:3; 1 s. [[אֲחַוֶּה]] Job 32:10, Job 32:17; sf. [[אֲחַוְךָ]] Job 15:17, [[אֲחַוֶּךָּ]] Job 36:2; Inf. cstr. [[חַוּׁת]];—declare, make known, c. acc. [[דָָּעַת]] Ps 19:3 (subj. [[לַיְלָה]], sq. [[לְלַיְלָה]]; ‖[[יַבִּיעַ אׂמֶר]]); c. acc. [[דֵּעִי]] Job 32:10, Job 32:17; c. 2 acc. [[וׇאִירָא מֵחַוּׁת דֵּעִי אֶתְכֶם]] Job 32:6, sq. sf. pers. + obj. cl., :[[וַאֲחַוֶּ֑דָּ כִּי־עוֹד לֶאֱלוֹהַּ מִלִּֽים]] Job 36:2 and I will shew thee that (there are) yet words for God; sq. sf. pers. only Job 15:17; —rd. prob. also [[וַאֲחַוֶּה]] for [[וַאֲקַוֶּה]] Ps 52:11 Hi Che al.
